content: decrease round knit to last 3 stitches after a row 2 or 6 using yarn b knit 14 16 18 sts before first instep marker k2tog k1 sm knit instep cut yarn a leaving end long enough to weave in on sts sm k1 ssk knit to end of round last round pm to indicate start of instep work 27 round 2 knit around 31 35 sts in pattern as established pm to indicate end of instep work 29 33 37 sts in pattern as repeat these two rounds until 56 64 72 sts remain established turn sock and begin heel flap 27 31 35 instep sts/29 33 37 sole sts chart is worked 14 16 18 times per round foot using 2 5mm needles and yarn b knit even for 6 more rounds do not cut yarn b using 2 75mm heel will be worked over 29 33 37 sts place needles and yarn a begin brick mosaic pattern remaining 27 31 35 sts on a holder for instep continue working brick mosaic pattern until foot heel flap is worked back and forth measures about 1-1/4 1-1/2 1-3/4 inches less than desired foot length ending after a row 4 or 8 of 2 color eye of partridge with garter stitch border brick mosaic pattern stitch cut yarn b leaving end row 1 with yarn b ws sl 1 k1 p25 29 33 k2 long enough to weave in row 2 with yarn a sl 1 k1 *k1 sl1 repeat from * to last 3 sts k3 chart is worked 14 16 18 times per round row 3 with yarn a sl 1 k1 p25 29 33 k2 row 4 with yarn b sl 1 k2 *k1 sl 1 repeat from transition to toe rm knit to last st before first * to last 4 sts k4 instep marker move one stitch from the sole to the row 5 with yarn b sl 1 k1 p25 29 33 k2 instep pm to indicate new start of instep k 28 32 repeat row 2 5 until heel flap is 2-1/4 inches or 36 sts pm to indicate new beginning of round desired length end after a row 2 using yarn a 28 32 36 instep sts/28 32 36 sole sts work heel turn toe using 2 5 mm needles and yarn a turn heel round 1 decrease round k1 ssk knit across to row 1 ws sl 1 p17 19 21 p2tog p1 turn last 3 sts before first instep marker k2tog k1 sm row 2 sl 1 k6 ssk k1 turn k1 ssk knit across to last 3 stitches k2tog k1 row 3 sl 1 p7 p2tog p1 turn round 2 k row 4 sl 1 k8 ssk k1 turn work these 2 rounds until 28 32 36 sts remain continue working one more stitch until all the stitches then work decrease round only until 16 20 20 sts have been worked do not turn work begin gusset remain use
